translations.1556898825888687618: This is a tool to help you make your own interactive 'readalong' that highlights words as they are spoken. Have a look at {$START_LINK}{$START_TAG_MAT_ICON}launch{$CLOSE_TAG_MAT_ICON} this example in East Cree{$CLOSE_LINK} to get a better idea of what these are.
translations.5372719220105519682: To get started making your own, read our {$START_LINK}privacy and data sovereignty policy{$CLOSE_LINK}, then take a tour by clicking on the tour button below, and follow the steps below.
translations.6144475229353813355: This app has not been officially released and should not be expected to work properly yet.
translations.9145384756401372637: We have built this tool with the top goal of respecting your privacy and data sovereignty. The audio that you use on this site {$START_BOLD_TEXT}does not get uploaded anywhere{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}. It will stay on your computer. The text you use for this Read Along will be uploaded over an encrypted connection to a server for preprocessing. The text is not saved and is not used for any other purpose. Using this site means that you agree for your data to be used in this way.
translations.6017683769837067192: Hmm, we can't connect to the ReadAlongs Server. Please try again later.
translations.1309246714146466494: Creating a ReadAlong is easy!    This guide will show you all the bells and whistles of the Studio.
translations.2521339316382884905: To make your ReadAlong, you'll need to add your text and audio.
translations.6934589696014916904: You can write your text directly into ReadAlong Studio, by selecting the "write" option.
translations.5896849056533765827: You can also use text from a plain text file (.txt) or a file in the RAS format (.ras).
translations.4200696836052759670: You can record your own audio for preprocessing using your browser's microphone.
translations.8374880530284796780: You can also select either a .wav or .mp3 file for your ReadAlong.
translations.1653005571499433141: Then, select the language of your ReadAlong. We support over 30 different languages, but if your language is not here, you can try using the Undetermined (und) option. If that doesn't work very well, you can always add your own language. This requires some understanding of your language's writing system. Feel free to reach out to us or visit our blog posts for more information.
translations.8980704896173010665: Once you've done this, you can click the "next step" button here to let Studio build your ReadAlong!
translations.87219244700621606: Here is how to format your plain text input text.
translations.8904656399440742498: Each line should ideally contain one sentence, although that is not a strict rule.
translations.5610204639574568399: Paragraph breaks are indicated by inserting a blank line.
translations.1412712598037814890: Page breaks are indicated by inserting two consecutive blank lines.
translations.6487299681734040440:
This is sentence one in paragraph one on page one.
This is sentence two in paragraph one on page one.

This is sentence one in paragraph two on page one.
This is sentence two in paragraph two on page one.


This is sentence one in paragraph one on page two.
translations.928026716351600936: Select data to start creating your ReadAlong
translations.2201040913045344114: In order to make a ReadAlong, we need 3 different things. We need to know {$START_BOLD_TEXT}which language{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} your readalong is in, and we also need some {$START_BOLD_TEXT}text{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, and corresponding {$START_BOLD_TEXT}audio{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.4075618332245544719: Select a plain text file (.txt) or a ReadAlong Studio temporary file (.ras)
translations.2424713887906008857: Write or paste your text here
translations.5685748095011794109: Use pre-recorded audio from an mp3, wav, or webm file.
translations.431006282683096128: If your language isn't supported in the list below, you can try and run it with the "Undetermined" option below. If that's not working very well, have a look at {$START_LINK}{$START_TAG_MAT_ICON}launch{$CLOSE_TAG_MAT_ICON} this blog post series{$CLOSE_LINK} to understand how you might get support for your language, or {$START_LINK_1}contact us{$CLOSE_LINK} for more info!
translations.7797047079884673368: You can use the dropdown below to select a pre-configured mapping for your language.
translations.4606148917260460531: Whoops, something went wrong while recording!
translations.1983793909601149790: Please try again, or select a pre-recorded file.
translations.7528020111424948593: Please (re-)record some audio or select an audio file.
translations.5640828320811588897: Please select or write text, select or record audio data, and select the language.
translations.1326685349515945581: processed, but not uploaded. Your audio will stay on your computer.
translations.2722548994886578004: processed. It will be uploaded through an encrypted connection when you go to the next step.
